content.raw:
The heightmap world failed on homebrew:

~~~
399: [Msg] Opening world file [worlds/heightmap_dem.world]
399: [Err] [Image.cc:94] Unknown image format[/Users/jenkins/workspace/gazebo-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64/gazebo7/media/dem/volcano.tif]
399: [Err] [ImageHeightmap.cc:35] Unable to load image file as a terrain [/Users/jenkins/workspace/gazebo-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64/gazebo7/media/dem/volcano.tif]
399: [Err] [HeightmapShape.cc:95] Unable to load an image as a terrain [/Users/jenkins/workspace/gazebo-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64/gazebo7/media/dem/volcano.tif]
399: [Err] [HeightmapShape.cc:206] Heightmap data size must be square, with a size of 2^n+1
399: 
399/492 Test #399: INTEGRATION_world_open ................................***Exception: SegFault 18.23 sec
~~~

I changed to a different heightmap world which uses `png` to see if that works d9dc7cc. [New build](http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64/76/) queued.

The heightmap world failed on homebrew:

399: [Msg] Opening world file [worlds/heightmap_dem.world]
399: [Err] [Image.cc:94] Unknown image format[/Users/jenkins/workspace/gazebo-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64/gazebo7/media/dem/volcano.tif]
